channel.title: Forgot how to add the News Bar to SMf
channel.description:
The place where the news fades in and out on Smf forums.. I forgot how to add it
Omfgorz help :p
Ojh and btw
The awards :p I ever seen someone sayd how to add awards.. But thats a long time ago How do you add them...

item.title: Forgot how to add the News Bar to SMf
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Lol, I like the way everyone tried to copies Kaitnieks/Mopars theme of pokemon.

Im currently creating others.
But Im not the person who copy kaitnieks lol.
I got them from mopar forums and mopar has it from kaitnieks lol

Read full topic
item.source: Forgot how to add the News Bar to SMf

item.title: Forgot how to add the News Bar to SMf
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

There is a mod you can download:

Modification link:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=115

SMF 1.1 RC2:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?action=download;mod=115;id=12133

SMF 1.1.1 RC3:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?action=download;mod=115;id=9711

After adding that package, when going into membergroups make them similar to this:

When making the award membergroup, make sure this is select:

After that, to make it appear under the stars, go into the user’s profile and into ‘Account Related Settings’. Then, make the user somewhat like this:

There you go! Now this member will have multiple Badges/Stars/Awards. You can equip as many more awards/stars as you want. Personal advice, always keep extra awards/stars/badges underneath the primary membergoup stars.

Read full topic

item.title: Forgot how to add the News Bar to SMf
item.dc:creator: @Rum0 Rum0
item.description:
@Rum0 wrote:

in your file manager go to the themes folder your using

for the default theme the one mopar uses it would be Themes>Default>Images

then just upload the picture to that folder and go to the starts and

well you can make the awards part of the group icon like the admin group icon would be pikasanta here all you do

item.title: Forgot how to add the News Bar to SMf
item.dc:creator: @Rum0 Rum0
item.description:
@Rum0 wrote:

well you can make the awards part of the group icon like the admin group icon would be pikasanta here all you do

go to admin > current theme > then go to this and put them all checks and the fade delay

then save and go to news and newsletters and change that to what you want
